message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only offer $14,000. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
